Sentence: The man claiming to be the author of the story is Buddy Glass, one of Franny and Zooey's older brothers
It is the Monday after the weekend Franny's breakdown started, and Zooey is at home in New York City
Bessie wants Zooey to talk to Franny, which he (Franny) eventually does
Over the course of this long discussion, Zooey helps Franny sort out her (Bessie) spiritual and personal beliefs, allowing her (Bessie), by the end, to find peace
